# ByteCount

A byte count with an optional suffix (K, M, G, T, to the base of 1024).

| Characteristic | Value                                                                         |
| -------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Type           | `string/number`                                                               |
| Format         | `\d+\s*[KMGT]?`                                                               |
| Examples       | `0`<br />`1`<br />`102`<br />`104576`<br />`1K`<br />`1M`<br />`5G`<br />`4T` |
